entry.title: From Sand to Sun and Sea
entry.summary:
Author: Hanya

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,106Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Before Eddie Diaz joined the 118, before the sirens and smoke and the chaos of the firehouse, he met Buckley in a warzone. She was a Navy SEAL, fearless and relentless, and for a brief, intense moment, their lives collided in ways neither could forget. Then, just as suddenly, she lost contact with himâ€”and when she believed him dead, she carried on living a life that honored the man she thought sheâ€™d lost. Years later, fate gives them a second chance. The shock of discovering Eddie is alive is only the beginning. As they navigate the complicated terrain of trust, old wounds, and lingering feelings, they grow closerâ€”slowly, carefully, recklessly. But life outside the battlefield is no easier: the 118 staff arenâ€™t kind to Buck, and the strain of the firehouse makes her question where she truly belongs. With loyalty, love, and the bonds of found family pulling them in different directions, Buck must decide whether to stay in a place that doesnâ€™t see her worthâ€”or leave everything behindâ€¦ and take Eddie with her. This is a story of reunion, resilience, and the quiet strength of two people who refuse to let go of each other, even when the world fights against them.

entry.title: And I'm damned if I do, and I'm damned if I don't
entry.summary:
Author: Calicomarie11

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,186Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: Eddie wasnâ€™t sure how he had found himself agreeing to tag along with his cousin Rafael to the Hotshots set on one of his few vacation days that were left. Rafa convinced him that even though he didnâ€™t have an agent (or any desire to have one) and he hadnâ€™t been hired for the gig, if he just showed up, they would let him on set. And the bastard had been right. They rolled up to the gate and went through with Rafaâ€™s work pass, and then he was dragged before the Assistant Director, who looked him up and down, and then made a slower pass before nodding thoughtfully. â€œYou look like you were meant to run into burning buildings. Have you ever done this before?â€ â€œNot as such, maâ€™am. I served two tours as an Army Medic.â€ â€œSo respectful,â€ she said, patting his cheek, â€œHeather, get him set up with paperwork and then take him to Rochelle for a costume. Weâ€™re going to make a firefighter out of you today.â€ ------- When Eddie tags along with his cousin to a TV set he finds more than an authentic LA experience.

entry.title: Perhaps the world ends today
entry.summary:
Author: SecretWriter22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,874Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 47

Summary: It's the end of the world and Maddie got the call.Follow the 118 as they regroup and try to survive in a world that has become hell on earth. May is trekking down back home;alone, Harry and Michael are running to get home from a doomed vacation. Athena undertakes a life threatening journey; finding her kids at the end of the world. Eddie and Buck are trapped at home together. Ravi is torn between his fear and his desire to be home with his family. Bobby is planning on ways to save his family despite the now dangerous terrain he needs to navigate.Los Angeles is full of disaster on the best of days and now with the undead breaking doors; the disasters seem insignificant....IT IS HERE! one of the two fics that have taken up all my brain power since last year.Light graphic depictions of gore, blood and mutilation.This is a buddie fic as well if you don't like em this ain't for you!

entry.title: What a night to forget.
entry.summary:
Author: Absolute_Maniac

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,776Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 60

Summary: â€œHey, can you see my phone anywhere?â€ he asked. Eddie started looking around the bed and then stretched himself to his side of the bed and pulled it from the nightstand.â€œHere.â€ He tossed it to him, and Buck immediately started looking through recent pictures on his phone. Pictures of them partying, a video of Eddie taking a shot, and another video of Eddie dancing.Then he came across the next picture and felt as if someone had thrown a bucket of ice water over his head. They must have asked someone else to take the picture because it was taken from at least a two-meter distance. The two of them were holding out a piece of paper towards the cameraâ€¦ and they were pressed together in a passionate kiss.Buck looked up from the picture when Eddie made a strangled sound on the other side of the room. â€œYou might want to see thisâ€¦â€ He reached over with a piece of paper in his hand. Buck took it and turned his phone over to him in return. Eddie bit into his fist as he studied the picture. Buck looked down at the paper in his hand and turned it over to the right side. It was a copy of a marriage license for Mr. Evan Buckley-Diaz and Mr. Edmundo Buckley-Diaz.

entry.title: Brown eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Nazz1987

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,244Chapters: 5/16Kudos: 18

Summary: Diego gave him a big sweet smile and for a second Buck lost control and his gaze landed upon the other's lips. Quickly realizing he was being challenged at a staring competition and went back to were he was. The guitar player break the game with a smile like a white flag on the horizon and took a swing of his drink. "I'm gonna warn you if you look at me like that again i might try to kiss you" and a cheeky smile tugged at Diego's mouth. Buck mirrored his face and leaned a bit closer "If you're asking for consent you already have it" and winked at him. They stayed still for a few beats, their faces were really close. Diego's eyes became darker and without loosing more time he closed their distance with a soft and sweet kiss. --- Or, Buck meets a new guy and starts dating. Eddie struggles with who he is and what he wants. This is after the opening emergency of S9. I promise a happy Buddie ending but a lot of things will happen in between!

entry.title: Recuerdame (Diaz de los muertos)
entry.summary:
Author: MultiFandomBL23

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,910Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Buck never imagined a movie would have him planning something as detailed as an altar for Dia de los muertos, but oh well.It wasn't anything new; he couldn't say no to the opportunity to make his Diaz boys happy. So, between research and conversations about remembering the dead, Buck learns more about traditions, part of the Diaz family history, and a new side of Eddie, all while making a dream come trueâ€”something Chris wanted to do thanks to Coco. Meanwhile, Eddie remembers the past, suffering as he thinks about the losses he's endured, questioning how everything changed when Buck entered his life and his son's. He joins this adventure to celebrate life and the memory of his wife, even though everything ended unresolved. And how can we forget Eddie Diaz, melting, speechless, and overwhelmed with emotion as he sees everything Buck is doing for them? Or... Thanks to watching Coco Eddie finds the way back to one of his favorites traditions while trying to deal and not avoid ShannonÂ´s memory and failing to keep everything Buck makes him feel.

entry.title: The Long Watch
entry.summary:
Author: Allypop_84

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,578Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 8

Summary: After a catastrophic fire leaves Eddie injured, he wakes with no memory of Buck or their life together. entry.title: shakin' out the thunder
entry.summary:
Author: Baby_Droll

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,585Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: "you were too far away," eddie says, smiling, too smug and proud of himself for making buck jump; his stomach rolls, and it's not from sea-sickness; he doesn't know what face he's making, but he's sure it's deranged; he gets flashes of neon lights and oil and rain slick parking lots, and the feeling of being pushed away, and the pancakes start threatening to make a reappearance. "i was leaving space for jesus," he shoots back, only barely keeping his composure; at least it makes eddie laugh again, even though his heart is beating in his throat, being this close; he wants to be better than this; he feels like the type of person they crack all of those jokes about when he's just brave enough to go to the gsa meetings that are rather ironically held in the chapel on campus; he moves his chair away again, only to get promptly dragged back, the feet of the chair scraping against the metal surface of the deck. ana coughs, and tommy stares at both of them like he's putting something together that buck would rather he didn't; it's embarrassing enough that maddie knows; if tommy puts it together, he might actually end himself.

entry.title: Never a Frown (With Golden Brown)

Author: ratking_withnotail

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 153,929Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 816

Summary: Percy Jackson was excitedâ€”genuinely excitedâ€”for the first time in what felt like years. A new city. A new name. A new face, even. The golden hair, the pale blue eyes, the tattoos that traced his skin like constellationsâ€”none of it screamed â€œPercy Jacksonâ€ anymore. He was Evan Buckley now, or just Buck, depending on who asked. Heâ€™d keep busyâ€”physically exhausted, mentally occupied, emotionally detached. That was the key. No attachments. No friendships. No relationships. No vulnerability. Heâ€™d learned the hard way that getting close to people only ended in pain. Either they died, betrayed him, or saw the legend behind the name and stopped seeing him altogether.Unfortunately, he hadnâ€™t planned on the 118.

entry.title: Dancing in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: TheRealBagelGod

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,418Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Eddie Diaz: Ballroom dancer, artist, eldest child, anxious mess. His entire life he's known what he has to be. The man of the house, the perfect student, the best dancer... heterosexual. When he meets Evan Buckley, younger brother of fellow dancer Maddie Buckley, his life is flipped upside down. --- Evan Buckley: Poet, brother, disappointment, and recent amputee. His life is at its lowest point. The only person he knows loves him is leaving, and he believes no one will ever stay. But when Eddie Diaz enters his life, he starts thinking, maybe thereâ€™s more to life than soul-crushing loneliness. --- The two of them resume their walk, and Eddie looks curiously at Maddieâ€™s brother. â€œShe talks about you a lot, Iâ€™m surprised I didnâ€™t figure it out sooner.â€ The boy hums thoughtfully, then asks, â€œDo you know my name, then?â€ Eddie shakes his head. â€œNope. Somehow I missed that.â€ â€œItâ€™s Evan.â€ Evan. His brain repeats. Eddie stops walking again, and holds out his hand. â€œNice to meet you, Evan. Iâ€™m Eddie. Diaz.â€Evan makes sure his crutch is tucked securely under his arm, then quickly takes the offered hand. â€œItâ€™s nice to meet you, too.â€
